targets.rawSql: SELECT time_bucket('1 minute', timestamp) as time, COUNT(*) as events FROM events WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as active_users FROM events WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes'
SELECT ROUND(AVG(duration), 2) as avg_duration FROM events WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND duration > 0
SELECT element, COUNT(*) as interactions FROM events WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) GROUP BY element ORDER BY interactions DESC LIMIT 8
